entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
